About ICAN

The Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) is a professional accountancy body in Nigeria. It is one of the two professional accountancy associations with regulatory authority in Nigeria, the other being the Association of National Accountants of Nigeria (ANAN). ICAN is in three stages namely Skills--Foundation--Professional each consisting of five papers each. The exam is written in march and september which is called diet.

Who is ICAN for?

The exam is for university graduates in any degree starting at the Foundation levels except for does with degree's in Account and Business related discipline will skip the foundation levels but will start from Skills level instead.

ICAN stages and exam papers

Foundation

  • Financial Accounting (F.A)
  • Management Business and Finance (M.B.F)
  • Management Information (M.I)
  • Corporate Law (Corp-Law)
  • Taxation
Skills
  • Financial Reporting (F.R)
  • Corporate,strategic,management & ethics (C.S.M.E)
  • Public sector account & finance (P.S.A.F)
  • Performance Management (P.M)
  • Audit and Assurance (A.A)
Professional
  • Corporate Reporting(C.R)
  • Case Study (C.S)
  • Advance Audit and Assurance(A.A.A)
  • Strategic Financial Management (S.F.M)
  • Advance Taxation
